strengthExercises.title: Strength Exercises
strengthExercises.subtitle: Traditional Strength Training
strengthExercises.description: Develop functional strength with traditional Hojo Undo tools for effective karate training
strengthExercises.historicalNote: These strength exercises have been passed down from master to student for centuries. They are developed to create functional strength that is directly applicable in karate techniques.
strengthExercises.safetyNotice: Expert guidance is essential for all strength exercises. Always start with light weights and focus on correct technique before increasing intensity.

hardeningExercises.title: Hardening Exercises
hardeningExercises.subtitle: Conditioning and Hardening
hardeningExercises.description: Develop physical and mental resistance with traditional hardening exercises for effective karate training
hardeningExercises.historicalNote: These hardening exercises are developed to prepare the body for the impact of karate techniques. They are essential for developing real fighting power.
hardeningExercises.safetyNotice: Hardening exercises should always be performed under expert guidance. Start carefully and build up gradually to prevent injuries.
